headline: A Renter Searches Across a Few Boroughs to Find More Space and a Bigger Bathtub
abstract: Seeking more space indoors and out, one renter with a $2,000 monthly budget explored whether it was worth leaving her South Bronx neighborhood. Here's where she wound up.
lead_paragraph: Seeking more space indoors and out, one renter with a $2,000 monthly budget explored whether it was worth leaving her South Bronx neighborhood. Here's where she wound up.
